PackageOracle.name: DA_ACCESS_METHOD_SUBSCRIPTION
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_ACCESS_METHOD_SUBSCRIPTION
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.35.181344000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,access_method_id IN NUMBER
,subscription_id IN NUMBER
,functionality_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,access_method_id IN NUMBER
,subscription_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_access_method_subscription;

body.name: DA_ACCESS_METHOD_SUBSCRIPTION
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_ACCESS_METHOD_SUBSCRIPTION
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.35.191591000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,access_method_id IN NUMBER
,subscription_id IN NUMBER
,functionality_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_access_method_subscription.add, parms=' || access_method_id || '|' || subscription_id || '|' || functionality_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_access_method_subscription a
(
a.access_method_id
,a.subscription_id
,a.functionality_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.access_method_id
,add.subscription_id
,add.functionality_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_access_method_subscription.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,access_method_id IN NUMBER
,subscription_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_access_method_subscription.del, parms=' || access_method_id || '|' || subscription_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_access_method_subscription a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.access_method_id = del.access_method_id
AND a.subscription_id = del.subscription_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_access_method_subscription.del');

END del;

END da_access_method_subscription;
